Plugin Documentation

Goals available for this plugin:

GoalDescription
ldap:dsml-dumpThis Mojo implements the dsml-dump goal which dumps content from the LDAP directory server in DSML format.
ldap:ldif-dumpThis Mojo implements the dsml-dump goal which dumps content from the LDAP directory server in LDIF format.
ldap:ldif-loadImplement the goal that loads a LDIF file.
ldap:runThis Mojo implements the run goal which launches an embedded LDAP server using Apache Directory Server.
ldap:stopImplement stop goal for the plugin.

System Requirements

The following specifies the minimum requirements to run this Maven plugin:

Maven3.0.4
JDKDefault target for maven-compiler-plugin version 2.3.2
MemoryNo minimum requirement.
Disk SpaceNo minimum requirement.

Usage

You should specify the version in your project's plugin configuration:

<project>
  ...
  <build>
    <!-- To define the plugin version in your parent POM -->
    <pluginManagement>
      <plugins>
        <plugin>
          <groupId>com.btmatthews.maven.plugins</groupId>
          <artifactId>ldap-maven-plugin</artifactId>
          <version>1.1.0</version>
        </plugin>
        ...
      </plugins>
    </pluginManagement>
    <!-- To use the plugin goals in your POM or parent POM -->
    <plugins>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>com.btmatthews.maven.plugins</groupId>
        <artifactId>ldap-maven-plugin</artifactId>
        <version>1.1.0</version>
      </plugin>
      ...
    </plugins>
  </build>
  ...
</project>

For more information, see "Guide to Configuring Plug-ins"
